text: if I told you that I was gonna make you
cheesy bacon toast how excited would you
be if you're not saying right now so
excited that I can barely contain myself
then you have never tasted this cheesy
bacon toast before and you have to go
out right now and buy these three
ingredients eight ounces of cheddar
cheese some bacon we're only using two
slices and a white onion and then some
bread just cut out of your cheese this
is an extra sharp cheddar because that's
my preference but you could use a mild
cheddar if you wanted to and get that
into a food processor then add your
onion one onion cut up everything's
gonna be pureed I have to cut up my
bacon just a little bit so that it
purees more evenly and then put that
right into the food processor
those are your ingredients you don't
even need salt and pepper because it's
bacon and cheese which are both salty
now that is done now what you need to do
is have your oven at 375 and get your
bread toasting the original recipe calls
for little cocktail breads but I'm using
these larger pumpernickel pieces and I'm
gonna cut them up afterwards
so line them up and have your oven at
375 to get these a little bit toasty
before you add your cheese spread it
should take about six minutes toast it
take your stuff spread the stuff over
your bread and have your oven on broil
now because these are gonna go back into
the oven on broil so that they can get
bubbly and golden brown if you wanted
the little bites you can buy the bread
that way or you can cut your bread up
into little squares you can prepare
these ahead of time if you like and then
just keep in mind that you need to throw
them into the broiler for like two
minutes to finish off but they'll hold
up pretty well I think in the fridge if
you wanted to just do this whole thing
ahead of times these can go right into
the broiler they just need to get bubbly
golden brown probably about two three
minutes these cheesy toasts are done
done done give yourself a bite before
you cut up the rest for everybody else
because it is a delicious snack treet
how could three ingredients be so
delicious
make this recipe and you'll find out
